meta.name: 秘撈工房 Below Shelter
meta.about:
Two Artists, Jerry Ng Sek Hin and King Lau King Lam created Below Shelter to make arts and crafts.
We do regular courses of woodworking(by Jerry) and ink art(by King). It is also a fun zone for board game, music, chitchat and chill.
Come and join us!
meta.addr: Room1209, 12Floor, Wah Yiu Industrial Centre, 30-32 Au Pui Wan Street, Shatin, New Territories, Hong Kong
